Go Pro? Maybe What You Need Is to Go Amateur

stories.text:
Hi,

We are a team of two PhDs (Stanford, Caltech) and an MBA (Stanford) developing a technology to help police officers better self-regulate under high stress and improve use of force decisions. We have pilots set with multiple police departments across the country and within the military (graduate of the Stanford H4D program) and looking for an Android developer to help build our first prototype.

The ideal candidate has 3+ years of experience developing mobile apps, interested/experienced in the wearable data analytics space has a passion for product building from scratch. Monetary compensation is possible but majority of compensation will be through equity. This is perfect side project for an experienced developer wanting to create social impact.

This is a 3-6 month contract with a possibility to full time hire.

Contact: melis@neurosmartinc.com
